text_block_list.name: Reportero A
text_block_list.text:
Wow, Hishi Amazon was truly something<n>else. Her
running today was quite<n>excellent.

text_block_list.name: Reportero B
text_block_list.text:
She's suddenly given us something to<n>look
forward to come next year!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon's jaw-dropping<n>performance
creates a stir among the<n>spectators.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe, no está mal, si lo digo yo<n>misma.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as I'm about to suggest she gets<n>some
hard-earned rest, a voice cuts into<n>our
conversation.

7.name: Miho Student B
7.text:
¡Oímos a la gente hablando de ti<n>en las
grandes! ¡Todos dicen que serás<n>la corredora
más grande el próximo año!

8.name: Miho Student B
8.text:
¡Nos emocionamos tanto, que tuvimos<n>que venir a
decírtelo!

8.name: Hishi Amazon
8.text: Hehe... Así que todos me tienen los<n>ojos encima,<n>¿eh?

10.text:
¡Gracias por el aviso! Supongo que<n>esto significa
no holgazanear para mí!

11.text:
¡Muy bien! ¡De vuelta a la academia para<n>algo de
entrenamiento!

13.name: Monólogo
13.text:
Hishi Amazon leaves the Hanshin<n>Racecourse with
her residents trailing<n>after her. I couldn't get a
word in to stop<n>them.

13.name: Monólogo
13.text:
Once the new year comes, Hishi Amazon<n>will
finally enter her classic year.

13.name: Monólogo
13.text:
Soon, it'll be time for her to decide<n>whether she
wants to pursue the Triple<n>Tiara tour or the
Classic Triple Crown<n>tour.

13.name: Monólogo
13.text:
In my opinion, the Tiara tour is better<n>suited for
her, considering her aptitude<n>for mile and
medium-distance races.<n>However...

13.name: Monólogo
13.text:
I'll ask her to start considering her<n>options, but
for now, I'll focus our<n>training plans on the first
Tiara race, the<n>Oka Sho.
